text: Recently opened along Guillemard road Bibik catering is a cosy little local cafe, specialising in Singaporean delicacy Kueh cakes and other sweet delights, it‚Äôs a good place to have a snack and a local tea or coffee. You can also get a local style breakfast with kaya toast and eggs as well as western breakfasts including pancakes with scrambled eggs and sausage. There are also good local options of beef rendang or chicken curry which was pretty good. It‚Äôs nothing fancy, but then it‚Äôs not supposed to be. The price is reasonable and the service friendly but still a bit rough around the edges, but atmosphere is casual so don‚Äôt expect too much. If you‚Äôre looking for a light local bite, check it out.
I have ordered Bibik catering for our staff‚Äôs Christmas party lunch buffet, it was good and very localised. We are really enjoy, especially the curry chicken, pineapple rice and bobochacha üòç
Bibik Caterers exceeded my expectations! The food was super delicious, but the cheesecake was truly heavenly! Awesome food and great service. Highly recommend.

The Basque Burnt cheesecake was simply heavenly.  The texture was smooth and soft and it just melts in your mouth.  The taste of cheese is just nice and it blends very well with the milky texture.

Its been awhile since I've tasted such a delicious cheesecake.

2 thumbs up!! üëç

We were greatly impressed when we first tried out the buffet for my child's birthday party from Bibik Caterers Pte Ltd. All my guests were very pleased with the tasty Perankan food.  Special compliments to Ms Joyce Hiew for her great recommendation and excellent service. Thank you so much for making our party an awesome one.
